Uses of BackEndLSP in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend
 

Classes in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend that implement BackEndLSP
 class BackEndLSPAdapter
          This slightly more concrete implementation of BackEndLSP includes storage and getter implementations for for the most basic, SDLIP-defined characteristics of the wrapped subcollection.
 

Uses of BackEndLSP in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc
 

Classes in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc that implement BackEndLSP
 class DocBackEndLSP
          An abstract BackEndLSP designed to use a search engine to index and access a collection of local, unindexed documents.
 

Uses of BackEndLSP in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.impls.text
 

Classes in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.impls.text that implement BackEndLSP
 class TextBackEndLSP
          A fully-implemented BackEndLSP that uses the Lucene search engine to access an unindexed, text-document collection.
 

Uses of BackEndLSP in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.impls.xml
 

Classes in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.impls.xml that implement BackEndLSP
 class XMLBackEndLSP
          A fully-implemented BackEndLSP that uses the Lucene search engine to access an unindexed, XML document collection.
